# BuyCar

![image](https://gcdnb.pbrd.co/images/IbIIVA44JSzX.png?o=1)

# Overview
 BuyCar is a website for selling second-hand cars.
 
# Features
<ul><li>Authentication</li>
<li>Crud Operation (add, delete, update, post)</li>
<li>Filteration</li>
<li>Pagination</li>
<li>Account Creation and Login</li>

  ## Front End
